data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Godda, Jharkhand, India, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Godda, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Godda, Jharkhand, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Godda, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,313,600 citizens of the the county of Godda.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Mundari people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please give the people in the county of Godda access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, may the churches in Godda, Jharkhand, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary:
the county of Godda, Jharkhand, India has a population of 1,313,600.

We estimate Godda has 14,450 people who might know Jesus, 15,938 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,283,212 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Godda that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

location.name: Godda
location.people_groups_list: Khandait, Nagarchi (Muslim traditions), Kawar, Angarok, Khadura
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Khandait (1,724,000), Nagarchi (Muslim traditions) (200), Kawar (984,000), Angarok (6,700), Khadura (15,000)
